actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 924 of title 18, United States Code, to make it a Federal crime to steal a firearm or explosives in interstate or foreign commerce.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to set penalties (a fine, up to five years' imprisonment, or both) for the theft of a firearm or explosive material in interstate or foreign commerce.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 924 of title 18, United States Code, to make it a Federal crime to steal a firearm or explosives in interstate or foreign commerce.
